title: Lock On☆
detail_text: <:th_ch0101/>Aim, aim~.... Fire!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>Aaah, I missed. The shooting gallery is hard, huh.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0108/>Are you aiming for the stuffed bear, Chikacchi?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>No, I was aiming for the snack beside it. I really want to eat it, but I wasn’t able to get one because it was time-limited.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0108/>Okay. Leave it to me☆<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>Eh, really!?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0108/>Of course, Mari doesn’t go back on her words.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0108/>Locked on to the target. Here we go~, shiny~!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>Uwaaah, you really got it! You’re amazing, Mari-chan!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0108/>Heh, there’s nothing in this world that Mari can’t get.... Just kidding♪<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
